scripts.generate-table: sequelize-cli model:generate --name author --attributes pen_name:string,profileId:integer,userId:integer && sequelize-cli model:generate --name book --attributes title:string,description:string,year:integer,page:integer,stock:integer,price:integer,image:string,status:string,authorId:integer,userId:integer,genreId:integer && sequelize-cli model:generate --name profile --attributes fullname:string,image:string,age:integer,nationality:string,gender:string && sequelize-cli model:generate --name genre --attributes name:string,userId:integer && sequelize-cli model:generate --name user --attributes username:string,email:string,password:string,role:string,profileId:integer
